about our company

create with the heart, build with the mind

Lentera Art Lighting is established on April 2004. We provide Lighting consultation, supply for Decorative Lighting and suggest which models appropriate.

We operate our newly renovated showroom in Puri area, West Jakarta which present some of our Decorative Lighting models. We welcome architects or owners to discuss on how we could make your property more valuable and comfort with the right Lighting distribution.
